episode_event_halloween_2022/4002_1001_0:
That’s boring. Isn’t that all caused by
ghost Pokémon?
Let’s go get candy with everyone instead.
Hmm... Kids these days are too pragmatic.
I wish I could have fun like everyone else.
episode_event_halloween_2022/6801_1031_0:
Ghost Pokémon are the
main attraction today...
episode_event_halloween_2022/6801_1001_0:
The city is full of ghost Pokémon... They’re so much
fun to look at!
We can do more than just look, y’know!

We’ve gotta battle Trainers so we can get a
bunch of candy from them!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4003_1001_0:
Hehehe! We’ve collected a lot of candy,
haven’t we.
I-I wonder if we can eat it all...

We’ll be fine! Everyone looks hungry from all
the battling.

Once I’ve finished eating this, I’ll battle you—and
maybe get some of your candy, too!

By the way, I noticed you’re wearing a different
mask than usual!
And you look just like Gourgeist. That’s so cute!

W-well... Today, ghost Pokémon are getting a
chance to be in the spotlight...
episode_event_halloween_2022/4003_1001_1:
And I also wanted to get closer with Gourgeist, so
I put a lot of effort into this costume!
Did you know Gourgeist can be different sizes?
And their strengths can differ, too.

I want my Gourgeist to make use of what he’s
good at...

And I want us to be a sync pair that can support
each other...
Yeah! I think that’s really great!

But hey, what is Gourgeist good at, anyway?
It seems like your Gourgeist is very big...

Small Gourgeist pretend to be children. That’s how
they fool you and get your guard down.

Large Gourgeist put on the guise of adults, and
that’s how they lead kids away...
And a supersized Gourgeist like my partner...
episode_event_halloween_2022/4003_1001_2:
There’s a real monster out there—something that’s
not someone in a costume!

Apparently, it laughs in a creepy way, then sprays
poison on Pokémon.

The Pokémon that’s sprayed will get weak and
can’t recover for a while, right?

Maybe it came from another world and was
attracted to the city since it’s filled with
ghost Pokémon.
I love it! It reeks of the supernatural!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4003_1001_3:
A-are you a ghost from the other side that got lost
in this world?

I know everything about the strange, mysterious
things that happen in this world!
I’ll seek out and uncover what this monster truly is!

Why don’t we follow her? I’m curious about the
monster, too!
S-sure... I guess we shouldn’t leave her alone.
episode_event_halloween_2022/4003_1001_4: It’s a bit scary, but I’m strong enough!
If we run into something, I’ll protect you two!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4004_1001_0:
No! For your own safety, it’s best you don’t get
involved with the monster!
No one will talk to us about the monster...

Perhaps someone’s trying to find it and they’re
forcing these people to keep quiet so it can remain
a secret...

There must be a secret organization behind this
that’s trying to cover up supernatural events!
Oh! Is that a Grass-type Pokémon?
I want to get a closer look!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4004_1001_1:
Do you know anything about the mysterious
monster people have been talking about around
the city?
I actually just saw it with my own eyes!

That’s great! We might be able to find
the monster!
Are you thinking of going there to investigate?
Of course! Will you come with us, Gardenia?

Um... Well, I’m a Gym Leader and have other
things to do, so...
episode_event_halloween_2022/4004_1001_2: I’ll leave the monster to you!
No time to lose! To the forest, everyone!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4005_1001_0: I wonder if it’s around here somewhere...
Th-the monster! It tried to attack you!

Thanks to you and Haunter, I’m fine! Thank
you, both!
They’ve got some nerve stealing MY ghost story!
That’s it—I’m really gonna cut loose...
episode_event_halloween_2022/4006_1001_0:
I’m not sure. It doesn’t look like a
ghost Pokémon...

It’s a Pokémon from a different world.
An Ultra Beast, no less.
From a different world? Ultra Beast?
If possible, I’d like to help it get back to its home.
episode_event_halloween_2022/4006_1001_1:
So were you the one telling people in the city not
to talk about it?
Yes. I wanted to take care of it quietly.
Oh... So you’re taking it away?
Please! Let us play with Poipole a bit more.

This Pokémon is dangerous. Even if it doesn’t mean
you any harm, we can’t let it roam around freely.

But I can tell how it’s feeling! I bet it was just
afraid because it came to a place it doesn’t
know well!

I was the same when I moved to the large cities
of Unova from the Village of the Dragons!

I was really nervous since there were so many tall
buildings—and a lot of people.

So I want Poipole to fall in love with Pasio before
going home!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4006_1001_2: I-if you don’t mind, I’d like that, too.

I think it’s normal for creatures from different
worlds to find each other scary, but...

I think it’s sad to push someone away just because
of that.

I know... However, I don’t think we’ll be able to
reach that level of understanding...

Well...perhaps I shouldn’t dismiss the idea
entirely before trying.

Why don’t we, then? I’ll allow you to watch over
Poipole for a while.
Help it make some nice memories, OK?
Will do! Thanks a bunch, Lusamine!
episode_event_halloween_2022/4007_1001_0: So, it was a Pokémon after all.

I guess I’ve done my part... I should probably
go home.
episode_event_halloween_2022/4007_1001_3:
Since you’re already here... D-do you want to join
our team?
episode_event_halloween_2022/4007_1001_0:
I’m not sure... I don’t really like it when things are
too lively...
But today is a special day for ghost Pokémon.

And since you like ghost Pokémon, I thought it
would be nice...
episode_event_halloween_2022/4007_1001_1: OK, we’ll join you... Thank you, Allister.

Join you indeed. I’ll show you everything about the
supernatural, Iris!
Great! Let’s go get more candy together!
You won’t be getting our candy that easily!

Now, Poipole! Let’s give it all we’ve got and win
this battle!

I don’t usually battle with Pokémon that
use poison...
But I think we work perfectly together!
I wanna get to know you better, so...
episode_event_halloween_2022/4007_1001_2: Let’s win this battle together! OK?

Your kindness and strength must’ve drawn out
its power.

That is Naganadel. It’s a dragon Pokémon that
excels in using Poison-type moves.

Iris is an expert at dealing with dragon Pokémon,
and as they were battling...
their feelings became one, and it evolved.
episode_event_halloween_2022/4007_1001_3:
As the girl who knows the hearts of dragons, you
should be the one to look after Naganadel...

Since it managed to evolve, I think it also wants to
stay with you.
Yes, of course! Great to have you, Naganadel!

Although there was no unraveling the mysteries
of the supernatural, I was able to witness such a
heartwarming moment...
I’m glad I was brave enough to join you.
